audioText: La mission spatiale vers Mars a été reportée en raison de conditions météorologiques défavorables au centre de lancement spatial.
question: Why was the Mars mission postponed?
options: Due to unfavorable weather conditions at the space launch center
Because of technical problems with the spacecraft's navigation system
Due to budget cuts in the space exploration program
Because the astronauts needed additional training time
explanation: The text states 'La mission spatiale vers Mars a été reportée en raison de conditions météorologiques défavorables au centre de lancement spatial' - The space mission to Mars was postponed due to unfavorable weather conditions at the space launch center. This is typical French media coverage of space exploration.
